entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 12:53 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
